title: University Education
content: Rouzbeh is a Bachelors student in Sharif University of Technology also known as SUT. He is studying computer engineering in SUT since 2019 and will be graduated next year

title: High School Education
content: Rouzbeh got his diploma in physics and mathematics from Allameh Helli 1 high school in 2018. He studied there for three years since 2015 and received notable achievements.

title: Work Experience
content: Rouzbeh has worked three month for Onyxlab as an intern in summer 2022. During these three month he was working on voice recognition systems

title: Interests
content: Rouzbeh is interested in many diverse fields in computer engineering including hardware, programming and Machine Learning.
